sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A short introduction for to learne to swimme. Gathered out of Master Digbies Booke of the Art of Swimming. And translated into English for the better instruction of those who vnderstand not the Latine tongue. By Christofer Middleton De arte natandi libri duo. Adaptation. English Digby, Everard, Sir, 1578-1606. Middleton, Christopher, 1560?-1628.
[88] p. : woodcut ill.
Printed by Iames Roberts for Edward White, and are to be sold at the little North doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun, At London : 1595.
Running title reads: The art of swimming. Signatures: A-L⁴. Imperfect; lacks B3 and B4. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Printed by Iames Roberts for Edward White, and are to be sold at the little North doore of Paules Church, at the signe of the Gun, At London : 1595.
